Html:
Hello,

I want to register my dll activeX in an environment where I don't have Visual Studio. My code has the same structure as the CSActiveX sample.

Typical functions for registering dlls (as resgam or regsvr32) don't work. What I can do? an exe that invokes the ComRegisterFunction?

Thanks in advance!

Angeles

Reg-free COM?

I've just been working it out - a bit tricky but got there in the end.

See:

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/eew13bza.aspx

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms973915.aspx
